data.title: Highest NPS Scores: Best NPS Scores From Top Companies in 2023
data.meta_description: Here are the top NPS scores from large companies. Find 100s of the highest Net Promoter Scores from companies with high NPS scores in this round up.
data.text:
For this article, we've looked all over the internet to find the latest NPS score data for these top brands.

We collected NPS scores for 100 top brands and ranked them highest to lowest. But, we couldn't fit them all on this page!

üëã Download the full top 100 NPS scores list here. üëã

Please note: Always check the sources! While we've tried out hardest to use legitimate sources (e.g. annual reports from each company), not everyone reports their NPS score. For those that haven't, we've found the next best publicly available source.

To learn more about NPS benchmarking, check out our guide to 'what is a good NPS score?' to learn how to safely benchmark your CX metrics.

NPS Scores for Top Companies (Ranked Highest to Lowest)

1. Princeton Mortgage, NPS score = 98

Princeton Mortgage was founded in 1983 as a licensed mortgage banker and is backed by a 100+ year old multi-faceted real estate brokerage, investment, and insurance company.

Princeton is in the financial services category, read our guide to NPS Benchmarks in financial services to learn more about the industry.

Princeton's NPS score

98

New Jersey, USA

Market Cap

$202.76 Million

2.5/5 (6 reviews)

2. Tesla, NPS score = 97

Tesla, Inc. is an American company that manufactures and sells electric cars, as well as power storage and photovoltaic systems. The company's goal is to ‚Äúaccelerate the transition to sustainable energy‚Äù.

Tesla is in the consumer brands category, read our guide to NPS Benchmarks in consumer goods to learn more about the industry.

Nutanix, Inc. designs and develops enterprise cloud platforms. The Company provides enterprise cloud platform solutions that converge traditional silos of server, virtualization, and storage into one integrated solution.

Nutanix is in the SaaS brands category, read our guide to NPS Benchmarks in SaaS to learn more about the industry.

4. Loanboox, NPS score = 90

Loanboox is the leading debt financing platform, which makes financing and investing simpler, more transparent, more secure and reduces costs. Its clients are public-sector authorities, banks, large corporations and institutional investors.

What's the highest NPS score?

The highest NPS score in our list is Princeton Mortgage, which achieved a score of 98 in 2020 according to the company themselves.

This is a score so high that it's frankly unlikely.

This would mean that 98% of Princeton's customers are NPS Promoters, since NPS is calculated out of 100 using this formula: % Promoters - % Detractors.
